abstract: The sudden failure of Washington Mutual has taken an unusual twist, with the bank’s estate suing JPMorgan Chase, its government-brokered acquirer, for $4 billion in deposits.
lead_paragraph: The sudden failure of Washington Mutual has taken an unusual twist, with the bank’s estate suing JPMorgan Chase, its government-brokered acquirer, for $4 billion in deposits.

headline.main: WaMu Sues JPMorgan for $4 Billion in Deposits
